div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ğŸŸ INFRASTRUCTURE EVOLUTION

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ğŸŸ£ PHASE 2: HIMALAYAN SCALE (10+ Regions)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ğŸ”µ PHASE 1: MULTI-REGION (5 Regions)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ğŸŸ¢ CURRENT: SINGLE REGION (Sikkim)

display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: rgb(27, 94, 32) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Single Application Instance
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
All data in one database
Monolithic architecture

div.style: color: rgb(27, 94, 32) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
PostgreSQL Database
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
7,096 kmÂ² coverage
~500 species
~10,000 occurrences

div.style: color: rgb(27, 94, 32) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Limited User Base
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
10-50 concurrent users
Single region focus

div.style: color: rgb(13, 71, 161) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Load-Balanced Application
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
2-3 API server instances
Region-aware routing

div.style: color: rgb(13, 71, 161) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Partitioned Database
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
167,382 kmÂ² total coverage
~2,500 species
~250,000 occurrences

div.style: color: rgb(13, 71, 161) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Redis Cache Layer
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
Tile caching
Query result caching

div.style: color: rgb(13, 71, 161) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Expanded User Base
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
100-500 concurrent users
Multi-region researchers

div.style: color: rgb(74, 20, 140) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Load Balancer
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
Nginx/HAProxy
Health checks
Auto-scaling

div.style: color: rgb(74, 20, 140) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
API Gateway
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
Rate limiting
Authentication
Request routing

div.style: color: rgb(74, 20, 140) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Microservices
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
Species Service
Occurrence Service
Indicator Service

div.style: color: rgb(74, 20, 140) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Distributed Database
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
Primary + Read Replicas
Regional partitioning
Sharding strategy

div.style: color: rgb(74, 20, 140) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Distributed Cache
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
Redis Cluster
Multi-level caching

div.style: color: rgb(74, 20, 140) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
CDN Distribution
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
Global edge network
Tile delivery
Static assets

div.style: color: rgb(74, 20, 140) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Large User Base
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
1000+ concurrent users
International access

div.style: color: rgb(230, 81, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Monitoring & Logging
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
Datadog/Prometheus
Error tracking (Sentry)
Performance metrics

div.style: color: rgb(230, 81, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Backup & Recovery
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
Automated backups
Point-in-time recovery
Geographic replication

div.style: color: rgb(230, 81, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Security Hardening
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
WAF protection
DDoS mitigation
Encryption at rest
